sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'], }) export class SignupComponent { signupForm: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { this.signupForm = this.fb.group({ firstName: ['', Validators.required], lastName: ['', Validators.required], email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], password: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)]], }); } onSubmit() { if (this.signupForm.valid) { // Handle form submission here console.log(this.signupForm.value); } } }
